sabes se  preciso usar outro kernel para ter o fat32 l ?
Downlaod and run the script ubotu told you about
That will make an entry in /etc/fstab for you.
If the partition exists, the script will detect and mount it.
If it does NOT exist, you're asking the wrong question.
